text: FIFTH: I direct that all of my just debts including charitable pledges whether or not the same are enforceable obligations of my estate and funeral expenses be paid as soon as practicable after my death.

texts: all of my just debts including charitable pledges whether or not the same are enforceable obligations of my estate
